name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: President Obama had a 24-hour vacation on the Gulf Coast of Florida. Some Republicans are attacking him for not staying longer. They have a point. President Bush used to vacation for weeks at a time.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The president was there to promote tourism in the Gulf. He even jumped into the Gulf to prove it was safe. Unfortunately, he did a cannonball right onto a pelican.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Paris Hilton got paid $3.5 million to wear fake hair. Thatâ€™s more than she gets paid to wear nothing.
